channel.description: Recent content in Windows Platform on MSPeople Technical Blog

item.title: Outlook 2003 not showing Embedded Images
item.description: Outlook 2003 not showing Embedded Images Check storage vssadmin list shadowstorage Run to reduce size vssadmin resize shadowstorage /on=c: /for=c: /maxsize=5GB

item.title: Reduce size for System VolumeÂ Information
item.description: Outlook 2003 not showing Embedded Images Deleting the reg key location : HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\11.
